description: Contents: Judah ben David Ḥayyuj, al-Afal daṿat ḥuruf al-lin (ff. 1v-95v). Judah ben David Ḥayyuj, al-Afal Dawat al-Mitlain (ff. 96r-117r). Abū al-Walīd Marwān ibn Janāḥ, Risalat at-takrib wat-tashil (ff. 117v-146r). Abū al-Walīd Marwān ibn Janāḥ, Kitāb al-mustalḥaq (ff. 146v-242r). Abū al-Walīd Marwān ibn Janāḥ, Risalat al-Tanbih (ff. 242v-250v). Abū al-Walīd Marwān ibn Janāḥ, Kitab al-Tasṿiyah (ff. 250v-263v).
title: Collection of grammatical texts
author: Ḥayyuj, Judah ben David
